summary:
Adds Starting Gear for Assassin type characters.
<br /><br /><br />-gloves(backstab)
<br /><br /><br />-boots(muffled movement)
descriptionHtml:
Adds one pair of gloves and boots to a cell in Helgen Keep (First Dungeon).
<br /><br /><br />Its the room where you find the "Dragonborn" book aswell as other starting gear.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />The boots are enchanted with the "muffled movement" enchantment.
<br /><br /><br />The gloves have the "backstab" enchantment.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />All other stats are equal to leather armor, and the items can be tempered just like leather armor.
author: g0tzilla
